metadata.title: Custom Websites & Web Apps for Small Businesses
metadata.description: We build affordable, professional websites for small businesses. WordPress, simple apps, or custom sites — everything you need to grow online fast.

hero.title: We build amazing <websites>websites</websites> for small businesses
hero.subtitle: With us you can build a modern website at an affordable price

about.title: How we help small businesses and entrepreneurs get an affordable website
about.body:
We are a team of experienced web developers helping small businesses, startups and entrepreneurs to create corporate websites, web apps, wordpress websites and any custom digital solution that fit your needs. From creating a website for your business to improving an existing one, we handle domains, hosting, designs, and all technical stuff so you don't have to!

Whether you need a one-page site, a personal brand presence, or a custom solution, we deliver affordable business websites that look professional, work fast, and grow with you.

No coding required — just your ideas and our expertise to bring your next online project to life.

services.title: What do we <keyword>offer</keyword> to your business?
services.subtitle: Services accessible to all our customers

static.title: Static Websites
static.body: Custom websites with static content, ideal for small companies and entrepreneurs that wants to make a simple website like a corporate website or an static portfolio. These sites are affordable, fast and efficient for stable content that doesn't change often.

wordpress.title: WordPress Websites
wordpress.body: Website development with WordPress, providing full control of the content without having to touch code. Ideal for medium-sized projects such as blogs, dynamic portfolios or product catalogs, offering flexibility and easy customization for businesses and entrepreneurs.

web-apps.title: Web Applications
web-apps.body: Custom web application development with advanced functionalities, such as online payment integration, personalized recommendation systems, live chat, real-time data analysis and content management. Perfect for medium to large projects, such as online stores, educational platforms, online booking systems, news portals, and business management systems (ERP, CRM).

consulting.title: Web Consulting
consulting.body: If you own a small business or are an entrepreneur looking to add new features or update your website, we’ll plan the whole process for you. From time estimates to budget planning, we provide you a clear path to improve your business engagement, delivering affordable and efficient plans that fits your business needs.

support.title: Web Support
support.body: If your website needs fixes or updates, our web support service keeps everything running smoothly. We correct errors, update content, handle plugins and hosting issues, and make sure your site stays secure and fast. With clear solutions and reliable support, you can focus on your business while we take care of the technical side.

optimization.title: Website Optimization
optimization.body: Our web optimization service makes your website faster, easier to use, and more visible online. We improve loading speed, mobile experience, and basic SEO so customers can find you quickly and enjoy browsing your site. With a smoother, more professional website, you’ll attract more visitors and turn them into clients.

button.aria_label: See more web development services for small businesses and entrepreneurs

technologies.title: Technologies we use to make engaging <keyword>websites</keyword>
technologies.subtitle: We are experts in state-of-the-art web development technology

clients.title: <keyword>Websites</keyword> we have worked in
clients.subtitle: Our biggest projects that we have build or improved

tailor.name: Guillermo Saez
tailor.body: With Bachacode Developers I found what many entrepreneurs are looking for and never find: The peace of mind of being able to leave your business in the hands of people who take care of it and help it grow with solutions that border on excellence. They provide ideas and are 100% involved with each project.

mesgo.name: Luis Fernando Carbajal
mesgo.body: Thanks to Bachacode Developers we were able to meet the requirements established by CBI Group to obtain our supplier number. The website they developed not only exceeded our expectations, but also facilitated the process and the presentation of our company.

button.aria_label: See our portfolio of web development projects we have done for small businesses and entrepreneurs

team.title: What we <keyword>guarantee</keyword> to your business
team.subtitle: What benefits your business will get working with us

development.title: Agile Web Development for Small Businesses
development.body: Our agile web development for small businesses delivers fast, custom websites tailored to entrepreneurs' needs, ensuring efficiency and scalability.

communication.title: Clear Communication in Website Development Projects
communication.body: We prioritize transparent communication in website development, keeping entrepreneurs informed to ensure your small business website aligns perfectly with your vision.

prices.title: Affordable Web Development Pricing for Entrepreneurs
prices.body: Our affordable web development services offer flexible pricing for small businesses, delivering high-quality websites that fit your budget and drive growth.

flexible.title: Flexible Website Features for Growing Small Businesses
flexible.body: Customizable website features adapt to your small business needs, ensuring entrepreneurs get flexible, scalable web development solutions until launch.

cristhian.name: Cristhian Flores
cristhian.body: Experienced in developing interfaces and APIs with both frontend and backend knowledge.

josibel.name: Josibel Farias
josibel.body: Specializing in creating intuitive and engaging user experiences, with a focus on visual design and usability to ensure efficient and enjoyable interfaces.
